predicate.note: Frames file for 'enclose' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 47.8.

example.name: passive, no agent
example.text: The entire site is enclosed [*-1] by a 6-to-8-foot-high ornamental iron fence with a small number of remote-controlled gates.
example.arg: a 6-to-8-foot-high ornamental iron fence with a small number of remote-controlled gates

example.name: with agent
example.text: Mary enclosed John's grave with a barbed-wire fence.
